testsuite.name: Admob Plugin Test Suite [All Android & Amazon devices]

testcase.name: ReportAd API
testcase.summary: Check request payload of ReportdAd
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app
2. Initialize the app
3. Load ad
4.Consent popup appear.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Map Gdpr prameter in config ad
3. Load and Play Ad.
4. Check request payload of reportAd.
step.expectedresults:
1. ReportAd API should contain following parameter.
"gdpr": {
"consent_status": "abc",
"consent_source": "publisher",
"consent_timestamp": 1234
}

testcase.name: GDPR opted_in Status
testcase.summary: Check for the API calls for opted_in GDPR status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Map Gdpr parameter in config ad
3.add parameter as "is_country_data_protected" as true in config ad
4. Load and play Ad.
5. Tap on I conscent
step.expectedresults:
1. GDPR parameter should display in Ads and ReportAd API.
2. Consent status should be displayed as 'opted_in' in ads API.
3. Consent popup should display when user play an Ad.

testcase.name: GDPR opted_out Status
testcase.summary: Check for the API calls for opted_out GDPR status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Map Gdpr parameter in config ad
3.add parameter as "is_country_data_protected" as true in config ad
4. Load and play Ad.
5. Tap on I do  not conscent.
step.expectedresults:
1. GDPR parameter should display in Ads and ReportAd API.
2. Consent status should be displayed as 'opted_out' in ads API.
3. Consent popup should display when user play an Ad.

testcase.name: GDPR time_out Status
testcase.summary: Check for the API calls for time_out GDPR status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. add parameter as "is_country_data_protected" as true in config ad 
3. Map Gdpr parameter in config ad
4. Load and play Ad.
5. Do not click on popup button i.e. accept or deny
6. Kill app or close app 
7. Observe report ad reesponse
step.expectedresults:
1. GDPR parameter should display in request payload of Ads API.
2. Consent status should be displayed as'opted_out_by_timeout' in ads API and report ad

testcase.name: GDPR Unknown Status
testcase.summary: Check for the API calls for unknown GDPR status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. add parameter as "is_country_data_protected" as true in config ad 
3. Map Gdpr parameter in config ad
4. Load and play Ad.
step.expectedresults:
1. GDPR parameter should display in Ads and ReportAd API.
2. By default consent status should display 'unknown'.
3. Consent popup should display when user play an Ad.

testcase.name: Lock/Unlock device on Consent popup
testcase.summary: Check Lock/Unlock the device on consent popup.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Configure 'is_country_data_protected' value as true in config API response.
3. Load and play Ad.
4. Lock/Unlock the device on consent pop up.
step.expectedresults:
1. App should not freeze/Crash when user unlock the device.
2. Consent popup should not disappear and appear properly.
3. Ad should pause when user unlock the device.

testcase.name: Background/Foreground app on Consent popup
testcase.summary: Check Background/Foreground the app on consent popup.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2.  Configure "is_country_data_protected" parameter value as true in config APi response.
3. Load and play Ad.
4. Background/Foreground the app on consent popup.
step.expectedresults:
1. App should not freeze/Crash when user bring app foreground/background app.
2. Consent popup should appear properly.
3. Ad should pause when user bring app to background/foreground app.

testcase.name: Kill app when Consent pop up displayed
testcase.summary: Verify kill the app when Consent popup displayed.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. configure  "is_country_data_protected" parameter value as true in config API response.

3. Kill and reopen the app.
step.expectedresults:
1. ReportAd API should get fire in charles of previously played Ad.
2. reportAd should contain GDPR parameter in request payload.

testcase.name: Consent pop up for Mraid ad
testcase.summary: Verify ad experience after consent pop up is displayed for Mraid ad
testcase.preconditions: Install Application

step.actions:
1. Map config response and set "is_country_data_protected" as "true" and  "START_MUTED" as "true"
2. Initialize the App.
3. Play Mraid Ad.
4. Tap on accept/deny
step.expectedresults:
1. Ad should not play when consent pop up is displayed on video.
2. Once user selects Accept/deny option, video should play

testcase.name: Native Ad Flexview Close timer option.
testcase.summary: Manipulate Flexview Close timer parameter.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1. Launch the test app.

2. Navigate to Placement Id's Configuration.

3. Set a Flexview close timer value greater than '0' eg. 2/4/15.

4. Load and play the specific Ad.
step.expectedresults: Ad should stop/close at specified time.

step.actions:
1. Launch the test app.

2. Navigate to Placement Id's Configuration.

3. Set a Flexview close timer value as 20.

4. Load and play the specific Ad.

5. Tap on close button while playing the Ad before specified time(20).
step.expectedresults: Ad should close properly when tap on close button.

step.actions:
1. Launch the test app.

2. Navigate to Placement Id's Configuration.

3. Set a Flexview close timer value greater than '0' eg. 2/4/15.

4. Load and play the specific Ad.
step.expectedresults: Ad should stop/close at specified time.

testcase.name: Auto Cached placement with multiple placement ID
testcase.summary: Check cached Ad is Played or not when user move app to background and reopen it.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Enter multiple placement ID (Auto-Cached and Non Auto-Catched)
3.Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on iOS device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Initialize the App
3)observe charles if ad is completely catched 
4)Move app to background
5)re-open the app and initialize it
6)Observe displayed Cached ads
step.expectedresults: 1. All cached ads should be displayed when user moves app to background and re-open it.

testcase.name: ri enabled value is true/false in request payload of config.
testcase.summary: Check ri enabled value in request payload of config.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Set ri enabled value true/false in request and map config file.

3. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the App and set charles proxy.
2. Enter the valid Placement id's.
3. Initialise the App.
4. Observe the request payload of config API.
step.expectedresults:
If ri value is true in request payload of config then you see ri call when the Incentivized Ad has reached 75-80% of completion.

If ri value is false in request payload of config then you will not  see ri call when the Incentivized Ad has reached 75-80% of completion.

(ri API - https://events.api.vungle.com/api/v5/ri )

testcase.name: Test Invalid VAST
testcase.summary: Check if SDK behaves accordingly when we malform response of "ads" API call.
testcase.preconditions:
1.Install the app.

2.Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1.Prepare malformed response as

"moat": {

     "is_enabled": false,
     "extra_vast": ""
2.Start test app.
3.Map "ads"API call to local or your remote server with CharlesProxy to return malform response.
4.Check SDK behaves accordingly.
step.expectedresults: SDK should not crash & should keep retrying to get valid ads. SDK should be able to play ads.

testcase.name: ri API call fire in charles.
testcase.summary: Check ri API call fired in Charles for Incentivized Ad only.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Set ri enabled value true in request and map config file.

3. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the App and set charles Proxy.  
2. Enter the valid Placement id's.
3. Initialise the App.
4. Load and play Incentivized Legacy Ad.
5. Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. ri API call should fire in charles for incentivized Ad.
2. ri API call should not fire in charles for non incentivized Ad.

(ri API - https://events.api.vungle.com/api/v5/ri )

testcase.name: User agent in API callls
testcase.summary: Presence of user agent in Vungle Endpoints for /new, /config, /ads, /will_play_ad, /report_ad, /ri
testcase.preconditions: 1.Install the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialise the app.

2. Enter pub app id.

3. Load ad.

4. Play ad.

5. Observer user agent in Config/new/ads/will_play_ad/Report Ad API
step.expectedresults:
1. Similar user agent should be present in all API call headers
2. User agent should be displayed in following format:

User-Agent : "VungleDroid/<sdk_version>"

testcase.name: view discrepancy

1)Install Application

testcase.name: CallToActionurl fired for Legacy Ads in Charles.
testcase.summary: Verify  CallToActionurl fired for Legacy Ads in Charles.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Initialise the app.

Legacy Ads:

1. "callToActionDest": "https://cdnspdl.arkofwar.com/download/ark/infinitywar-alipay-release.apk",
2. "callToActionUrl": "https://app.appsflyer.com/com.tap4fun.brutalage_test?pid=vunglecnandroid&c=2&af_r=http://ba-marking.tridentstudio.cn/ba/without_text/2/index.html"

step.actions:
1. Change the 'callToActionurl' and 'callToActiondest' parameter value in response payload of Ads API.

2. Map the Legacy Ad response.

3. Initialise the app.

4. Load and Play Legacy Ad.

5. Tap on the Download button during Adplay or on End card.

6. Observe Clickurl, PostrollClick and callToActionurl fire in charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. Postrollclick should get fire in Charles.

2. CallToActionurl and click url should get fired in charles after postrollclick TPAT.

testcase.name: ri enabled value is true/false in request payload of config.

3. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the App and set charles proxy.
2. Enter the valid Placement id's.
3. Initialise the App.
4. Observe the request payload of config API.

If ri value is true in request payload of config then you see ri call when the Incentivized Ad has reached 75-80% of completion.

If ri value is false in request payload of config then you will not  see ri call when the Incentivized Ad has reached 75-80% of completion.

(ri API - https://events.api.vungle.com/api/v5/ri )

testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Enter multiple placement ID (Auto-Cached and Non Auto-Catched)
3.Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on iOS device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter valid Placement id's (Auto-Cached and Non Auto-Catched) and active all placement ID's.
3)Initialize the App
4)observe charles if ad is completely catched 
5)kill the app
6)re-open the app and initialize it
7)Observe displayed Cached ads
step.expectedresults: 1. All cached ads should be displayed when user kill app and re-open it.

5.Observe the TPAT

testcase.name: Test Invalid VAST
testcase.summary: Check if SDK behaves accordingly when we malform response of "ads" API call.
testcase.preconditions:
1.Install the app.

2.Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1.Prepare malformed response as

"moat": {

     "is_enabled": false,
     "extra_vast": ""
2.Start test app.
3.Map "ads"API call to local or your remote server with CharlesProxy to return malform response.
4.Check SDK behaves accordingly.
step.expectedresults: SDK should not crash & should keep retrying to get valid ads. SDK should be able to play ads.

testcase.name: ri enabled value is true/false in request payload of config.
testcase.summary: Check ri enabled value in request payload of config.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Set ri enabled value true/false in request and map config file.

3. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the App and set charles proxy.
2. Enter the valid Placement id's.
3. Initialise the App.
4. Observe the request payload of config API.
step.expectedresults:
If ri value is true in request payload of config then you see ri call when the Incentivized Ad has reached 75-80% of completion.

If ri value is false in request payload of config then you will not  see ri call when the Incentivized Ad has reached 75-80% of completion.

(ri API - https://events.api.vungle.com/api/v5/ri )

testcase.name: CallToActionurl fired for Legacy Ads in Charles.
testcase.summary: Verify  CallToActionurl fired for Legacy Ads in Charles.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Initialise the app.

Legacy Ads:

1. "callToActionDest": "https://cdnspdl.arkofwar.com/download/ark/infinitywar-alipay-release.apk",
2. "callToActionUrl": "https://app.appsflyer.com/com.tap4fun.brutalage_test?pid=vunglecnandroid&c=2&af_r=http://ba-marking.tridentstudio.cn/ba/without_text/2/index.html"

step.actions:
1. Change the 'callToActionurl' and 'callToActiondest' parameter value in response payload of Ads API.

2. Map the Legacy Ad response.

3. Initialise the app.

4. Load and Play Legacy Ad.

5. Tap on the Download button during Adplay or on End card.

6. Observe Clickurl, PostrollClick and callToActionurl fire in charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. Postrollclick should get fire in Charles.

2. CallToActionurl and click url should get fired in charles after postrollclick TPAT.

testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app

2. Set ri enabled value true in request and map config file.

3. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the App and set charles Proxy.  
2. Enter the valid Placement id's.
3. Initialise the App.
4. Load and play Incentivized Legacy Ad.
5. Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. ri API call should appear in Charles after completion of 75% of Legacy Ad.

(ri API - https://events.api.vungle.com/api/v5/ri )

testcase.name: ri API call fire in charles.
testcase.summary: Check ri API call fired in Charles for Incentivized Ad only.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Set ri enabled value true in request and map config file.

3. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the App and set charles Proxy.  
2. Enter the valid Placement id's.
3. Initialise the App.
4. Load and play Incentivized Legacy Ad.
5. Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. ri API call should fire in charles for incentivized Ad.
2. ri API call should not fire in charles for non incentivized Ad.

(ri API - https://events.api.vungle.com/api/v5/ri )

testcase.name: Incentivized option enabled-Check a "customized" alert dialog when user try to close incentivized ad
testcase.summary: Check a "customized" alert dialog when user try to close incentivized ad
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialise the App 
  2. play ad

step.actions:
1. Start Test app
  2. Set "incentivized ad" ON in options tab
  3. Change "Incentivized Alert Text" in options tab
  4. Init SDK and play an ad
  5. Try to close ads by X button while an ad is playing back.
  6. Check if an alert dialog shows up with customized text
step.expectedresults: Title, Body, Close, and Continue text should be displayed as you customize

testcase.name: Play Flex Feed ad
testcase.summary: Flex Feed ad
testcase.preconditions:
Install app.
Load Flex Feed ad

step.actions:
1. Play flex feed ad.
2. Observe close button behaviour
step.expectedresults:
1. For inline video, close button should not be displayed. But after completion of 1st loop, close button should get displayed.
2. For 2 page video, close button should not be displayed on video. But close button should be displayed on End card.

testcase.name: reportAd parameter value after kill/close the testapp.
testcase.summary: Check reportAd parameter value when user kill/close the testapp and restart.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialise the app.

2. Enter Pub app Id and placement id.

3. Load and play Ad.

4. While playing ad kill/close the app.

5. Restart the app.

6. Observe the request payload of reportAd.
step.expectedresults:
1. All the parameter value should display proper value in request payload of reportAd.

2. None of the parameter in request payload of reportAd should contain invalid value.

testcase.name: Check for the config API fire in charles for initialization.
testcase.summary: Check for the config API fire in charles each time user initialise the app.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialise the app.

2. Load nad play the app.

3. Close the app.

4. Restart the app.

5. Repeat steps 1-4 for 2, 3 times.

6. Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults: Config API should fire in charles each time user initialises the app.

testcase.name: Auto Cached placement with multiple placement ID
testcase.summary: Check cached Ad is Played or not when user kill the app and reopen it.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Enter multiple placement ID (Auto-Cached and Non Auto-Catched)
3.Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on iOS device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter valid Placement id's (Auto-Cached and Non Auto-Catched) and active all placement ID's.
3)Initialize the App
4)observe charles if ad is completely catched 
5)kill the app
6)re-open the app and initialize it
7)Observe displayed Cached ads
step.expectedresults: 1. All cached ads should be displayed when user kill app and re-open it.

testcase.name: Test Invalid VAST
testcase.summary: Check if SDK behaves accordingly when we malform response of "ads" API call.
testcase.preconditions:
1.Install the app.

2.Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1.Prepare malformed response as

"moat": {

     "is_enabled": false,
     "extra_vast": ""
2.Start test app.
3.Map "ads"API call to local or your remote server with CharlesProxy to return malform response.
4.Check SDK behaves accordingly.
step.expectedresults: SDK should not crash & should keep retrying to get valid ads. SDK should be able to play ads.

testcase.name: Native Ad Flexview Close timer option.
testcase.summary: Manipulate Flexview Close timer parameter.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1. Launch the test app.

2. Navigate to Placement Id's Configuration.

3. Set a Flexview close timer value greater than '0' eg. 2/4/15.

4. Load and play the specific Ad.
step.expectedresults: Ad should stop/close at specified time.

step.actions:
1. Launch the test app.

2. Navigate to Placement Id's Configuration.

3. Set a Flexview close timer value as 20.

4. Load and play the specific Ad.

5. Tap on close button while playing the Ad before specified time(20).
step.expectedresults: Ad should close properly when tap on close button.

testcase.name: GDPR opted_in Status
testcase.summary: Check for the API calls for opted_in GDPR status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Map Gdpr parameter in config ad
3.add parameter as "is_country_data_protected" as true in config ad
4. Load and play Ad.
5. Tap on I conscent
step.expectedresults:
1. GDPR parameter should display in Ads and ReportAd API.
2. Consent status should be displayed as 'opted_in' in ads API.
3. Consent popup should display when user play an Ad.

testcase.name: GDPR time_out Status

testcase.name: Lock/Unlock device on Consent popup
